description: Make a statement on the slopes and shred in style in the Women's Snowboard Full Cushion Pattern OTC Socks. Featuring a one-of-a-kind print, our most advanced Indestructawool™ technology for enhanced durability, 4 Degree™ elite fit system for an unmatched performance fit, and a Virtually Seamless™ toe for top-notch comfort. With these top sock technologies in your corner, you're free to push farther and go further.
name: Smartwool Snowboard Full Cushion Iguchi Pattern Over The Calf Socks - Mens

specs.value: 66% Merino Wool, 11% Nylon, 21% Recycled Nylon, 2% Elastane
